preferences.paragraph_title_text: En sikkerhetsoppdatering er nødvendig på maskinen din.
preferences.paragraph1_text: On October 25, 2021, Apple released their current operating system, macOS 12 Monterey.
preferences.paragraph2_text: In accordance with Apple's OS release cycle, we anticipate that macOS 10.15 will no longer receive security updates starting November 2022.
preferences.paragraph3_text: A fully updated device is required to online materials, to begin the update process please click the button below.
